name: Senki Kanshoku Symphogear ~Shirabemeshi~
nutshell: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.

name: The Children's Teacher Mr. Kwon
tags: Long Strip,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: A teacher goes to a rural school to teach a class of five unique children.

name: Bastard!! -Unused- Revised Edition
nutshell:
Events taking place between volumes 18 and 19 of Bastard!!
This material was originally going to be in the main manga, but that ended up not being the case.
It was later released in various stages of completion over 3 doujinshi (Sketch, Unused, and Unused- Revised Edition)

name: In Love with a Minor!
nutshell: A 28-year-old Mika realizes that she’s been so busy with work that she hasn’t had a boyfriend for 10 years. One day, a young coffee shop employee Itsuki invites her for a date. To Mika’s surprise, he confesses to her. Despite his innocent and honest personality, he approaches her fiercely. His rough kisses momentarily steal Mika’s heart. He touches her with his hot fingers, craving her body, rendering Mika unable to refuse! Bewildered by the simple-hearted Itsuki’s love, Mika lies about her age...

name: Cafe dé Hanadan
nutshell: CAFE dé HANADAN is a spin-off and sequel of Boys Over Flowers. The series follows Tsukushi Makino and her interactions with the F4, including her boyfriend Tsukasa Domyoji.

name: Shiki Tsukai
nutshell: Young Akira has a destiny: He's a shiki tsukai, a warrior with the magical power to control the seasons. He also meets the beautiful Koyomi, another warrior, who is sworn to protect him. For there are evil forces intent on destroying Akira - and the entire universe!

name: Kuroko no Basket - Little Fox Bye Bye (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Aomine x Kise

name: Only Your Hero!!
nutshell: Sousuke is a shy high-school student who is in love with his childhood friend, Yobiko. Yobiko has been attacked by crows since she was a young girl, causing the other children to avoid her, but Sousuke has always been there to protect her. When the park where she used to hide from the crows is demolished, Sousuke promises that he’ll try even harder to protect Yobiko.

name: Touhou - Uzu (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Sekibanki x Wakasagihime doujin.

name: Pocket Monsters SPECIAL Sword & Shield
nutshell: Pokemon Sword and Shield Manga Adaptation, featuring Gear Meister Soudo and computer scientist Schildemilia.

name: Silent Blue
nutshell:
When Aoko was four, a meteorite struck her town. It then rained for twenty days straight, and the crater became what's now known as the Twenty Day Lake. Two decades later, Aoko can't remember the day the meteorite fell, or anything of her life in the town beforehand. And so she dives deep into the lake, searching for that something in her memories that she can't let go of…
A 1-volume manga.
Links:
Author's Twitter: @icori_a

name: Kanga na Spoon
nutshell: Borrowing Yoshiaki's words, 'pretentious hippy' describes Kasumi. Inseparable since their school days, Kasumi is an independent and super sexy freeloader that comes and goes from Yoshiaki's room…and his bed..Not only that, there's more to Kasumi than meets the eye…

name: Japan Archipelago of Toads and Frogs
nutshell: This is a coming-of-age story depicting the days of torment and lust for a young man, Sei, who was instilled with a distorted view of sex at a young age that reminded him of toads' mating. One day, after being told about sex by older boys, the young Sei insisted that his mother would never do such a thing. However, when Sei woke up in the middle of the night, he was deeply shocked to see his mother having sex......!

name: Kanojo no Sekai
nutshell: A girl finds out her quiet classmate's secret and decides to blackmail her.

name: Touhou - Life of Maid (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Everyday events revolving around the residents of Scarlet Devil Mansion.
Danbooru textbox translations link

name: I'll Become the Tyrant's Tutor
nutshell:
Primabelle is astonished when she wakes up to find herself in a novel of her own creation as an obscure painter who gets killed by the male protagonist, Prince Rainsis.
The world she created has not been kind to Rainsis. In addition to being colorblind, he has been shunned and feared his entire life, for a prophecy had been made that “the one trapped in a black and white world shall drench the empire in blood.” Primabelle resolves to disprove the prophecy after witnessing his misery firsthand.
To do so, she must track down his destined other half. The only problem? All she knows about the fair beauty is that she has black hair and crimson eyes. Will Primabelle be able to help Rainsis see the world in all its splendid colors and find true happiness?

name: Return of the Lord
nutshell: Water God Ming Yao sacrifices his life for the lives of the three realms, yet becomes the servant of Jun Sheng, the Demon Lord after five hundred years. Does he live the rest of his life as a mere servant, or pretend to be meek and get his way up, using his strengths to return to the heavenly realm? His relationship with the Demon Lord in the past life never really ended, how does he cut off those shackles? What will be Ming Yao's future?

name: I've Been Here From the Beginning
nutshell:
One day, wallflower Kim Hyejin wakes up as her web novel counterpart, Maria, a maid who is ignored by... well, everyone. No one ever really notices her, as if she was a ghost, but Grand Duke Dietrich can't seem to take his eyes off her. Seeing his rival's interest in the girl, Prince Elias resolves to use her for his own advantage in the battle for the throne. As misunderstandings and mystery surrounding Maria grow, she's quickly going from invisible to intriguing to... potentially irresistible!

‘Don’t be like that. I feel bad for the maid TT’
I pitied the maid side character forgotten by the author, so I left a comment. The next day, I became that pitiful maid, Maria Mayer. Because of her zero presence, I was called a ghost. So I thought all I needed to do was work hard, but then people started becoming interested in me. The future crown prince and the grand duke!
“I can’t feel your presence at all. Who exactly are you?”
The crown prince, Elias, was interested and yet cautious of Maria and decided to place her beside him.
“There’s nothing I can do if you can’t remember me. I just need to make sure you don’t forget about me from now on.”
I’m sure this is our first meeting, but the grand duke approached me as though he knew me. I-I… I’m just Regular Maid #1 (nickname: Ghost)!

Original Webtoon
Official Translations:

English
Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语
Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語
Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia
Japanese / 日本語

name: The Strongest Warlord Goes to School
nutshell:
Seok Hyun-woo is frequently bullied by the troublemakers at his school, who love to take advantage of Hyun-woo’s poor circumstances. Hyun-woo toughs it out though and continues to endure this frustrating situation. This all changes though, when on one (un)fortunate night, Hyun-woo is beaten and embarrassed by the bullies, with his spirit being pulled from his body shortly afterward. Coinciding with this odd occurrence, a bizarre abnormality takes place somewhere else in the vast universe… Due to that bizarre abnormality, the spirit of Hyun Woo-seok, a powerful warlord from an alien planet, is forced into Hyun-woo's body. Woo-seok, now a powerful warlord in a moody highschooler’s body, swiftly and easily overpowers the bullies… In his head, however, the bewildered Woo-seok has just one question: Where the hell am I?! The bullies, unaware of what’s happened to Hyun-woo, begin planning their vengeance. They do this, even though they were the ones picking on him in the first place… Seriously? It’s time for this alien warlord to dish out some payback on these sneering pricks!

Original Webtoon (kakao)
Original Webtoon (RidiBooks)
Original Webtoon (Naver)

name: Shiden Kai Hawk
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
In the summer of 1944, at the end of World War II, a young airman, Jotaro Taki, arrived at Kaohsiung Air Base in southern Taiwan to join the 701st squadron, which was organized with the famous "Shiden" aircraft. Although training had been the only thing he had been doing, Taki was soon given the opportunity to participate in actual combat. Taki, who had taken the liberty of leaving the formation and flying alone, received a lot of flak, but was accepted by his comrades. One day, he receives an urgent order to attack the U.S. military base at Marcotte in the Philippines with only the 701st Squadron... What is war? What are we fighting for? The coming-of-age of a boy aviator in agony between life and death!

name: Riri Re Kasutamaizu Moderaa mo Isekaide wa Renkinjutsu-shi!?
nutshell: A boy finds some kind of action figure, who turns out to be a girl from another world to involve him in her story.

name: Namaiki Kareshi
nutshell:
Kashiwagi plans on asking his girlfriend to marry him. When he catches her cheating on him with another man, he's left in shock. Despairing over his misfortune, he gets drunk at the small pub he frequents only to wake up naked and in bed with the owner's nephew, Izumi, who's only eighteen!?
PT/br:
“Kashiwagi planeja pedir para a sua namorada que se case com ele, mas descobre que ela estava o traindo com outro homem, e isso o deixa em choque. Desesperado com o infortúnio, acaba ficando bêbado em um pequeno bar que frequenta, e quando acorda se dá conta que está nu na cama com o sobrinho do proprietário do bar, Izumi, que tem apenas dezoito anos?!

name: Mi-chan to Airi
nutshell: The story of an OL and the witch she discovers, now living together. (from MangaUpdates)

name: Mirai Nikki Redial
nutshell: A story that picks up after the first story ends. It tells the tale of the 3rd Universe's Gasai Yuno after her encounter with the Yukiteru and Yuno of the other universes. Her life seems normal, but something feels like it is missing. She can't help being fascinated with the boy in her grade, Amano Yukiteru, because he keeps appearing in her dreams…

name: Nordiska Sonata
nutshell: The prequel, Vienna Concerto, is about the relationship Takemiya Keiko has with a talented Japanese boy who attends in the Vienna the music school and writes her letters about his studies and his life.

name: Apple Collection
nutshell: Collection of oneshots released under Apple Artbook Collection

name: Tamashii no Futago
nutshell:
From Storm in Heaven:
Alex and Rite are two souls who died at the same moment on different ends of the earth. This is the story of their interactions with the humans who can see them as they travel towards each other.

name: SUPER Dobutsu Zoo
nutshell: The daily lives of Tony the mouse (27 years old), Kony the rabbit (27 years old) and Pony the elephant (29 years old), living in the animal city "Big City".

name: Samu Neko Azuki-san wa Sekai no Chuushin
nutshell: Short anecdotes about artist Nobeko's cat Azuki.

name: The Vampire
nutshell: I am a hungry Vampire.I longed to suck the blood of a destined one, which is said to be the finest, but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day, I got a hateful comment--.
